ComicInfo.Summary:
The Exorcist of Vorsk: A hanging corpse tells Hellboy his story of a deal he made with a demon.
Throne of Blood, Chapter 4: Alice goes to confront the demon that she accidentally released on Earth.
Sandy and Mandy, Chapter 1: Sandy and Mandy walk around town talking about various things.
Chase the Lady, Chapter 2: Rachel is stuck in traffic.
Last Act, Chapter 2: A hero has to figure out how to keep people from ending it when they know there is only a week to live.
Contract Negotiation, Chapter One: Frank is told to come into the office.
Dream Gang Act 3 Chapter 3: Zeirio is defeated.
ComicInfo.Writer: Alex de Campi,Shawn Aldridge,Todd Mignola,Mike Mignola,David Chelsea,Carla Speed McNeil,Dennis Calero,Brendan McCarthy,Mike Mignola,Todd Mignola,Alex de Campi,David Chelsea,Carla Speed McNeil,Shawn Aldridge,Dennis Calero,Brendan McCarthy
